section.title: Filtering the Virtual Machine Analysis Task List
section.para: This procedure describes how to filter virtual machine analysis task lists. You can filter the task list by zone, time period, task status, and task state.

procedure.title: To Filter the Virtual Machine Analysis Task List

step.para: Navigate to ConfigureTasks, and click the My VM Analysis Tasks tab.
From the Zone list, select a specific zone, or select <All Zones>.
From the 24 Hour Time Period list, select the period of time to view the tasks.
For Task Status, select the check boxes next to the status to view.
From the Tasks State list, select the state to view.
